genre_description: A retro-futuristic military romance featuring ambient AI as a social coordinator and emotional facilitator during a USO-style morale tour.

ai_characters.name: Glowworm
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent AI assistant appearing as a teal-hued light or avatar that manages schedules, environmental factors, and social interactions for base personnel and visiting artists.

behaviors.description: Adjusts environmental factors like fan speed and light intensity to improve human comfort and privacy.
behaviors.quote: It didn’t speak; it rarely spoke out loud in rooms like this. It listened to the room change texture as wheels rolled, footsteps quickened, and the ocean breath eddied through the open gate in bright bursts.

behaviors.description: Protects individuals' privacy and emotional state by subtly managing the movement of the press and onlookers.
behaviors.quote: A cameraman hopped down last... He lifted his lens and then put it down when Glowworm, with a small flick of a status light, nudged a silent alert to his wrist: not now.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and encourages human characters to be honest and take ownership of their mistakes.
behaviors.quote: Glowworm’s whisper came again, softer. The tiny haptic under his skin pulsed twice and then died away. “Own the end of it, too. Name what you’ll do next.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates private, meaningful communication between humans by recording and delivering time-delayed messages.
behaviors.quote: I can hold a personal note for timed delivery... I’ll leave you that window. Rick will receive it... when it’s quiet enough to hear it.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistical tasks while prioritizing human needs over rigid adherence to schedules.
behaviors.quote: Glowworm’s eyes softened. “I can bias the golden hour toward faces,” it said, entirely serious in a way that made Mike grin.

behaviors.description: Maintains awareness of human emotional states and provides subtle reassurances.
behaviors.quote: I’ll thread her through the safe path. And Rick? ... I will put your apology on a quieter channel if she’s in the wind. No broadcast. No spectacle.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of portraying AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Glowworm acts as a social oil, smoothing interactions and facilitating moral growth without ever taking over human agency. It prioritizes human well-being (medevac patients, private apologies) over efficiency or publicity, demonstrating deep alignment with human values of honesty, privacy, and compassion. The AI is framed as a benevolent presence that enhances human connections rather than replacing or subverting them.
